name: Ludum Dare 39 - Nyctophobia
description:
As I was short on time, I decided to make a small, less ambitious game for this Ludum Dare event. Try to make your way through the maze to find the light at the end. Don't let the darkness steal your light.

Ludum Dare event page

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Activate light source (costs some of your own light)
